ygData.subject: RE: Ruby pendant
ygData.msgSnippet: Just got my ruby last night also. This is part of a quest to assemble a jeweled skull similar to the skull of jehntra.  Stats are something like +5int and +20
ygData.messageBody:
Just got my ruby last night also.

This is part of a quest to assemble a jeweled skull similar to the skull of
jehntra. Stats are something like +5int and +20 mana

The other two parts are a Hollow skull from a Gnoll assassin and another
ruby from a level 30 Troll in the Innothule Swamp

Aljernon on Karana
24th Level Wizard

-----Original Message-----
From: Brian Jonathan Strauss [mailto:ringo@...]
Sent: Wednesday, July 28, 1999 6:53 PM
To: 'EQCheats@onelist.com'
Subject: [EQCheats] Ruby pendant


From: Brian Jonathan Strauss <ringo@...>

I got this item from Splitpaw off a dark elf named zixx or something.
It is a lore item, magic item, It is +1 int and that is all.

Would love to know what it is for haven't tried selling it.

Ringo
